column2: Hold the Feast of Remembrance, where songs and poems of the great heros of old will be sung. All your vassals will be invited.
Hold the Feast of Starlight, a time of feasting and singing beneath the starlight. All your vassals will be invited.
Hold a great feast where you can eat the flesh of your enemies and recieve homage from your vassals.
Hold the Feast of Durin, where tales of old will be sung, salted pork eaten and ale drunk. All your vassals will be invited.
